title: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing a report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the dialog that appears does not display the default values for the parameters. Instead, all the values are empty.
EB: In the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values should be shown in the value box for each parameter. This will allow users to modify only the parameters they want to change, without having to input all values again.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create several report parameters. 2. Set default values for the parameters. 3. Drag the parameters to the report layout. 4. Preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
